hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT COUNTRY_CURRENCY_ID, COUNTRY_CODE_2, COUNTRY_CODE_3, COUNTRY_LANGUAGE_CODE, COUNTRY_NAME, COUNTRY_NUMERIC_CODE, CURRENCY_ALPHABETIC_CODE, CURRENCY_NAME, CURRENCY_NUMERIC_CODE, CURRENCY_SYMBOL, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM SYS_COUNTRY_CURRENCY WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO SYS_COUNTRY_CURRENCY ( COUNTRY_CURRENCY_ID, COUNTRY_CODE_2, COUNTRY_CODE_3, COUNTRY_LANGUAGE_CODE, COUNTRY_NAME, COUNTRY_NUMERIC_CODE, CURRENCY_ALPHABETIC_CODE, CURRENCY_NAME, CURRENCY_NUMERIC_CODE, CURRENCY_SYMBOL, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${COUNTRY_CURRENCY_ID}, ${COUNTRY_CODE_2}, ${COUNTRY_CODE_3}, ${COUNTRY_LANGUAGE_CODE}, ${COUNTRY_NAME}, ${COUNTRY_NUMERIC_CODE}, ${CURRENCY_ALPHABETIC_CODE}, ${CURRENCY_NAME}, ${CURRENCY_NUMERIC_CODE}, ${CURRENCY_SYMBOL}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE SYS_COUNTRY_CURRENCY SET COUNTRY_CODE_2 = ${COUNTRY_CODE_2}, COUNTRY_CODE_3 = ${COUNTRY_CODE_3}, COUNTRY_LANGUAGE_CODE = ${COUNTRY_LANGUAGE_CODE}, COUNTRY_NAME = ${COUNTRY_NAME}, COUNTRY_NUMERIC_CODE = ${COUNTRY_NUMERIC_CODE}, CURRENCY_ALPHABETIC_CODE = ${CURRENCY_ALPHABETIC_CODE}, CURRENCY_NAME = ${CURRENCY_NAME}, CURRENCY_NUMERIC_CODE = ${CURRENCY_NUMERIC_CODE}, CURRENCY_SYMBOL = ${CURRENCY_SYMBOL}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
